Dituding Biang Kerok Neraca Dagang Tekor, Berapa Besar Impor BBM RI?
06 Nov 2019, 09:38 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Kilang Pertamina/Foto: Dok. Pertamina

Jakarta - Penyelesaian impor bahan bakar minyak (BBM) masih menjadi pekerjaan pemerintah. Sebab, impor BBM disebut-sebut sebagai salah satu penyebab neraca dagang tekor.Lantas, berapa besar impor BBM sebenarnya?Dalam acara bertajuk Media Breafing Proyek Kilang Stretegis, Direktur Megaproyek Pengolahan dan Petrokimia PT Pertamina (Persero) Ignatius Tallulembang menjelaskan, kapasitas terpasang kilang yang ada saat ini baru 1 juta barel per hari. Dari kapasitas terpasang itu, jumlah yang berproduksi sekitar 850 ribu barel per hari.Dari 850 ribu barel tersebut, BBM yang dihasilkan sekitar 650 ribu barel per hari."Kondisi saat ini 2018, kita tahu bersama kita masih impor sebagian besar produk (BBM), karena kapasitas kilang baru 1 juta (barel per hari). Dari 1 juta kapasitas terpasang, beroperasi 800 ribu sampai 900 ribu, katakanlah average 850 ribu, menghasilkan produk BBM 600 ribu-650 ribu barel ribu, BBM itu gasoline, solar," katanya di Kantor Pusat Pertamina, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Sementara, kebutuhan BBM nasional lebih dari dua lipatnya sekitar 1,3-1,4 juta barel per hari. Artinya, dengan konsumsi 1,4 juta barel lalu produksi dalam negeri cuma 650 ribu barel, sisa BBM itu masih dipenuhi impor."Kemudian kebutuhan BBM kita dua kali lipat 1,3-1,4 juta ketergantungan energi dalam negeri sebagian besar masih kita impor," jelasnya.Oleh sebab itu, Pertamina saat ini tengah membangun enam kilang di mana dua di antaranya adalah kilang baru. Dengan begitu diharapkan produksi BBM bisa dipenuhi dalam negeri lebih banyak lagi."Kita akan tingkatkan kapasitas 1 juta menjadi 2 juta kapasitas kilang," ujarnya. Accused of Stubbornly Striking the Trade Balance of Tekor, How Big is Indonesia's BBM Import?
Nov 6, 2019, 09:38 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Pertamina Refinery / Photo: Doc. Pertamina

Jakarta - Completion of imports of fuel oil (BBM) is still the work of the government. This is because BBM imports are said to be one of the causes of the overdone balance of trade. Then, how much is the actual import of fuel? there are currently only 1 million barrels per day. From the installed capacity, the amount that produces is around 850 thousand barrels per day. From the 850 thousand barrels, the fuel produced is around 650 thousand barrels per day. "The current condition is 2018, we know that together we still import most of the products (BBM), because of the new refinery capacity of 1 million (barrels per day). From 1 million installed capacity, operating 800 thousand to 900 thousand, say an average of 850 thousand, producing fuel products from 600 thousand to 650 thousand barrels thousand, fuel is gasoline, diesel fuel, "he said in Pertamina Head Office, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Meanwhile, national fuel needs more than doubled around 1.3-1.4 million barrels per day. It means, with 1.4 million barrels of consumption and then only 650 thousand barrels of domestic production, the remaining fuel is still filled with imports. "Then our fuel needs are doubled from 1.3 to 1.4 million of domestic energy dependence, we still mostly import. "He explained. Therefore, Pertamina is currently building six refineries, two of which are new refineries. "With this, it is hoped that domestic fuel production can be met even more." We will increase the capacity of 1 million to 2 million refinery capacities, "he said.
